avataar - 3D Senior Manager - Platform Delivery

Location - Bangalore, Work Type: Full time

Support July 01, 2022

Job Responsibilities:

  • Responsible for building, motivating and upskilling the entire Platform Delivery team.
  • Partner with business teams to ensure appropriate resource allocation across all projects.
  • Monitor workload and drive delivery excellence across the Platform Delivery team to provide our global clients with the best in industry outcomes.
  • Proactively anticipate issues with existing workflow, technology and staffing, and present solutions to management with sufficient time for action to be taken.
  • Excellent communication and skills and demonstrated ability to navigate through ‘organized chaos’.
  • Collaborate with HR and business partners to lead hiring, training and performance management.
  • Communicate a consistent and compelling picture of the company’s position as a world-class 3D XR/AR organization to clients and staff.

What’s in it for you?

  • Extremely competitive compensation.
  • Opportunity to lead a fast-growing team of 100+ members today with the potential to grow up to 300+ members.
  • Unparalleled opportunity to build a global business out of India.
  • Owning primary responsibility to scale a critical function.

Job Requirements:

  • 10+ years in Platform Delivery with 5+ years leading a team of artists specializing in all areas of 3D.
  • Strong technical grasp of key 3D principles - modelling, texturing, animation, lighting.
  • Well versed with relevant software including, but not limited to 3Ds Max, Maya, Blender, Z-Brush, Substance Painter, V-ray.
  • A highly organised individual who enjoys the creative process and managing a department/team.
  • Deep understanding of AR/XR industry with global exposure.
